titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Sergeant Family Papers
titlestmt.author: compiled by C. Anthony Myrans and staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 10:06

did.unittitle: Sergeant family papers

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: Correspondence and other papers of several members of the Sergeant family of Massachusetts and Connecticut. Major correspondents include George Sergeant (1822-), of Northampton, Massachusetts; his sister, Catharine Sedgwick Sergeant De Forest, married to Dr. Henry A. De Forest; and his daughter, Catharine De Forest Sergeant (1848-). The collection contains correspondence on female education in Syria and education of women in the United States. Later letters, mainly in the 1870s, describe the experiences of women as students and as teachers in Princeton, New Jersey, Chicago, West Haven, Connecticut and elsewhere. Also includes family photographs and daguerreotypes.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of the estate of Katharine S. White, 1977-1978.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Sergeant Family Papers (MS 806). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Correspondence and other papers of several members of the Sergeant family of Massachusetts and Connecticut. Major correspondents include George Sergeant (1822-), of Northampton, Massachusetts; his sister, Catharine Sedgwick Sergeant De Forest, married to Dr. Henry A. De Forest; and his daughter, Catharine De Forest Sergeant (1848-). The collection contains correspondence on female education in Syria and education of women in the United States. Later letters, mainly in the 1870s, describe the experiences of women as students and as teachers in Princeton, New Jersey, Chicago, West Haven, Connecticut and elsewhere.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: George Sergeant was a resident of Northampton, Massachusetts and Seymour, Connecticut.

Catharine Sedgwick Sergeant De Forest (approximately 1817-1896), sister of George Sergeant, was born in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. She was a descendent of John Sergeant (1710-1749, Yale 1729), a missionary to Native Americans in western Massachusetts who established a boarding school for Native American children in Stockbridge. De Forest and her husband, Henry De Forest (Yale 1832, MD 1835), established and administered the first school for girls in Syria in the 1840s and early 1850s, where Henry De Forest was stationed as a medical missionary. John W. De Forest, author, also spent several years at the school in Syria.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The material is arranged as received from the donor.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The materials were arranged by the donor. Manuscripts and Archives created the collection level description and did minimal level description in the 1970s or 1980s. In 2018, staff of Manuscripts and Archives augmented the description of the collection and the description of the files.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright status for collection materials is unknown, though much of the material in this collection is likely in the public domain. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

did.unittitle: Inventory
Genealogical and biographical notes and photographs regarding the De Forest, Partridge, Quincy, and Sergeant families

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Also includes two photographs of a Chippendale side chair.

did.unittitle: Genealogical notes regarding the Clark, Hadley, Partridge, and Sergeant families

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Also includes a biographical note on Erastus Sergeant (1742-1814).

did.unittitle: Financial records, correspondence, photographs, and artifacts

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes deeds, accounts, receipts, promissory notes, and credit orders payable in kind of Dr. Oliver Partridge; a letter to Sewall Sergeant; a photograph of an unidentified woman; and the red leather pouch of Dr. Oliver Partridge, in which the folder contents were stored.

did.unittitle: Genealogical notes, legal and financial documents, and correspondence

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes genealogical notes regarding the Clap, Clark, Sergeant, and Williams families; a copy of the last will and testament of Dr. Oliver Partridge; deeds, quit claims, plans, and maps regarding division of property in Partridgeville; apothecary notes and note book of Dr. Oliver Partridge; transcripts (manuscript and typescript) of letters by Ephraim Williams, Jr. and Caleb Strong; bills and receipts; and a recipe-book of Lydia Ann (Clark) Sergeant.

did.unittitle: Papers of Erastus Sergeant regarding the disposal of the estate of John Fowler, Tory refugee

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes receipts, inventories, accounts, promissory notes, and credit orders payable in kind.

did.unittitle: Indentures, leases, accounts, inventories, and other papers regarding John Fowler's estate
Printed material and writings

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes printed material and newspaper clippings on the history of Stockbridge, Massachusetts; a poem by (Mrs. Theodore) Pamela (Dwight) Sedgwick, titled 'Address to the Bridge from the honorable body of Nations'; and a photograph of an unidentified woman.

did.unittitle: Letters to Lydia Ann (Clark) Sergeant from George Sergeant
Correspondence between George Sergeant, Clarissa (Partridge) Sergeant, Catharine (Sergeant) De Forest, and Dr. Henry De Forest
Correspondence between George Sergeant, Clarissa (Partridge) Sergeant, Catharine (Sergeant) De Forest, and Dr. Henry De Forest

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Also includes correspondence with Susan (Sereant) Dashiell, George F. De Forest, Sewall Sergeant, Sr., Lydia Ann (Clark) Sergeant, Sewall Sergeant, Jr., F. A. Sergeant, Charles Spencer Sergeant, Cary (Mrs. Elliott) Sergeant, and other family members.

did.unittitle: Correspondence between George Sergeant, Clarissa (Partridge) Sergeant, Catharine (Sergeant) De Forest, Dr. Henry De Forest, and Elliott Sergeant
Correspondence between George Sergeant, Clarissa (Partridge) Sergeant, Catharine (Sergeant) De Forest, and Dr. Henry De Forest

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Also includes correspondence with Frank Fowler, C. A. Ely, and other family members and friends.

did.unittitle: Correspondence between George Sergeant, Clarissa (Partridge) Sergeant, Catharine (Sergeant) De Forest, and Dr. Henry De Forest

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Also includes correspondence with Caroline (Sergeant) De Forest, S. H. Colton, Egbert Starr, Lydia Ann (Clark) Sergeant, and other family and friends.

did.unittitle: Correspondence between George Sergeant, Clarissa (Partridge) Sergeant, Catharine (Sergeant) De Forest, and Dr. Henry De Forest

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Also includes correspondence between Oliver Partridge and numerous friends, acquaintances, and family members, including E. A. Clarke, S. H. Colton, E. Dewey, Frank Fowler, Joseph Lathrop, Samuel P. Putnam, George W. Root, and Egbert Starr; additional family correspondence among Clarissa (Partridge) Sergeant, Sewall Sergeant Sr., Sewall, Jr., and others; and social invitations to George Sergeant and family members from friends.

did.unittitle: Letters to George Sergeant from Sewall Sergeant, Sr., Clarissa (Partridge) Sergeant, Sewall Sergeant, Jr., Caroline (Sergeant) De Forest, Elliott Sergeant, George F. De Forest, Alfred H. Dashiell, S. H. Colton, Joseph Lathrop, E. B. and William Williams, and other associates

Letters to George Sergeant from Sewall Sergeant, Sr., Clarissa (Partridge) Sergeant, Sewall Sergeant, Jr., Caroline (Sergeant) De Forest, Elliott Sergeant, George F. De Forest, Alfred H. Dashiell, S. H. Colton, Joseph Lathrop, E. B. and William Williams, and other associates

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Also includes correspondence with Dr. Oliver Partridge, Susan (Sergeant) Dashiell, Edwin A. Clark, Frank and Henry Fowler, James O. Root, Frances Searle, J. M. Whitcomb, Lydia Ann (Clark) Sergeant, and Ely family members.

did.unittitle: George Sergeant correspondence and invitations

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes letters to George Sergeant from Clarissa (Partridge) Sergeant and Joseph Lathrop, as well as social invitations to George Sergeant from friends and acquaintances.

scopecontent.p: Includes letters to Catharine (Kitty) De Forest Sergeant (born 1848) from Catharine (Kate) (Sergeant) De Forest and T. Searilt [?]; letters to Emma (Mrs. Marvin M.) French from Lydia Ann (Clark) Sergeant; and letters to Clarissa (Partridge) Sergeant from Sewall Sergeant, Sr. and George Sergeant.

scopecontent.p: Includes letters to Catharine (Kitty) De Forest Sergeant from Charles Spencer Sergeant and Elliott Sergeant; letters to Mary Louise Sergeant from Sewall Sergeant, Jr.; and letters to George Sergeant from E. R. Williams.

scopecontent.p: Includes letters to Lydia Ann (Clark) Sergeant from Caroline (Sergeant) De Forest. Also includes letters to Lydia Ann (Clark) Sergeant and Catharine (Kitty) De Forest Sergeant from Susan (Sergeant) and Alfred Dashiell.

scopecontent.p: Includes letters to Catharine (Kitty) De Forest Sergeant and Mary Louise (Mollie) Sergeant from Catharine (Sergeant) De Forest. Also includes letters to Catharine De Forest Sergeant and Clarissa (Partridge) Sergeant from Mary Louise Sergeant and letters to Mary Louise Sergeant from George Sergeant.

scopecontent.p: Includes letters to Mary Louise and Catharine (Kitty) De Forest Sergeant from George Sergeant and Sewall Sergeant, Jr. Also includes letters to George Sergeant, Lydia Ann (Clark), and Catharine (Kitty) De Forest Sergeant from Catharine (Sergeant) De Forest.

did.unittitle: Catharine (Kitty) De Forest Sergeant letters

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes letters to Catharine (Kitty) De Forest Sergeant from Catharine and Martha P. Clark and other family members.

did.unittitle: Diaries and notebooks

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes a diary by an unidentified writer, 1845; an account book by an unidentified writer, 1848; and an undated inventory book and undated notebook by unidentified writers.

did.unittitle: Typescripts and photostats of Sergeant correspondence

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes copies of letters by Clarissa (Partridge) Sergeant, Caroline (Sergeant) De Forest, Charles Spencer Sergeant, and Abigail (Williams) Sergeant Dwight (died 1791).

Additional material

scopecontent.p: Additional Sergeant family papers, etc., bequethed to Yale University under the will of Katharine S. White and received by Manuscripts and Archives, Sterling Memorial Library, June 1978.

Mortgage deeds, discharges, and an insurance policy
Mary Sergeant letters

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes seventeen letters from Mary Sergeant, August 1861-October 1868 and two letters to Mary Sergeant, August 1861-May 1866. Also includes one letter to George Sergeant, January 3, 1860.

did.unittitle: Letters to Mrs. William Heinsdale from Sergeant family members

scopecontent.p: Includes fifteen letters to Mrs. William Heinsdale from Lydia, Kittie, and other Sergeant family members.

did.unittitle: Letters to Lydia Sergeant and George Sergeant

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes forty-seven letters to Lydia Sergeant from her father, S. Clark, and others, August 1847-March 1860. Also includes nine letters to George Sergeant, March 1852-January 1864.

scopecontent.p: Includes twenty-three letters to Kittie Sergeant from Winnie and Nellie (her nieces?), Cousin Elsends, and other family members.
